analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/32/0xe6a97415bbea239f98e2b699a6e1c5c46523792e.sol:
	Contract BuyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/32/0xe6a97415bbea239f98e2b699a6e1c5c46523792e.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

BuyToken.pullOut (/unique_chucks/32/0xe6a97415bbea239f98e2b699a6e1c5c46523792e.sol#547-550) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(owner,_amount) (/unique_chucks/32/0xe6a97415bbea239f98e2b699a6e1c5c46523792e.sol)
